experience.description: Issued by all managed care, contracted, commercial, and Medicare Managed Care payers. Conducted retro authorizations based on medical records and communication with physicians and other care providers/departments of the hospital. Responded to level of care denials and Medical Necessity denials through formal written appeals. Prompted for documentation in chart to clarify diagnoses. Determined appropriateness and medical necessity of patient admissions, continued hospital stay, and use of ancillary services. Ability to read payer clinical bulletins and translate back to the procedures and diagnosis billed for.

2003-2004 Staff RN Surgical Intensive Care Unit Full-Time Assessed, diagnosed, planned, treated and evaluated patients requiring intensive and intermediate care. 2004-2006 Staff RN Cardiovascular Medical and Surgical Step-down Unit. Full Time 04-05, PRN 05-06
